author: Newsweek
title: Florida Map Shows Counties Set to Freeze When Polar Vortex Hits
text:
News PressBee .. Newsweek Watch the post from Florida Map Shows Counties Set to Freeze When Polar Vortex Hits, Now to the details
Parts of Florida are forecast to see temperatures plunge in January, with wind chills down to 22 degrees Farenheit.
florida map shows counties set to freeze when polar vortex hits
